component.description: An I-a2b solar ionization panel that has been scavenged from a long-abandoned wreck and repurposed to harness energy production amidst the endless sands of Tatooine. It was originally a power system designed by Sienar Fleet Systems, but it is a long way from the original form it used to have. It still has enough of its girondium-colium core to function, albeit at a reduced efficiency.
